description.value:
This healer's toolkit contains a seemingly endless supply of bandages, herbs, and healing items of impeccable quality, granting you a +3 item bonus to Medicine checks.

If you use the marvelous medicines when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Treat Poison] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Treat Disease], before you roll your check, the medicines attempt to counteract the poison or disease you're treating, with a counteract rank of 8 and a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+30 #Counteract]]{+30}. This is a healing effect.

The medicines can't be used to treat the same affliction for that patient again
